meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of calcium tungstate.
meanings.sent1: Miners found a scheelite deep in the cave.
meanings.sent2: The geologist identified the scheelite under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The scheelite decided to play hide-and-seek with the other minerals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a scheelite in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The scheelite sparkled like a tiny star in the rock.

meanings.definition: A yellowish or brownish mineral, tungstate of calcium, CaWO4, an important source of tungsten.
meanings.sent1: Miners were excited to discover a scheelite deposit in the mine.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler crafted a beautiful necklace using scheelite gemstones.
meanings.sent3: The scheelite mineral blushed when it realized its value.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes gleamed like precious scheelite in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The scheelite shone like a hidden treasure in the earth.
